info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 9:22PM MST until July 30 at 12:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM MST/1130 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona and southern Nevada, including the following counties, in northwest Arizona, Mohave. In southern Nevada, Clark. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM MST /1130 PM PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 922 PM MST /922 PM PDT/, Locally heavy rainfall persists across the western edge of the Las Vegas Valley...with rainfall amounts of over one half inch near Summerlin. Elevated runoff persists in Las Vegas Valley washes and will continue through late this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Boulder City, Downtown Las Vegas, East Las Vegas, The Strip, Paradise, Nellis AFB, Sam Boyd Stadium, Green Valley, The Motor Speedway, Aliante, Spring Valley, Enterprise, Lake Las Vegas, Anthem, Southern Highlands, Lone Mountain and Summerlin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
